@graph.name: MuSiC-Deconvolution: Data generation | bulk | ESet
@graph.description:
This workflow creates bulk ESet objects from uploaded raw matrix & metadata files

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Bulk matrix to ESet | Creating the bulk RNA-seq dataset for deconvolution](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/bulk-music-3-preparebulk/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Uses [subworkflows](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_subworkflows.html)
